entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
